column4: Hey, I have an interesting request for anyone who wants to help

Alright, so here's the basis. My computer has stopped detecting my cd drive. I've run firmware and everything to try to get it to detect it again. Nothing's worked. I also don't have a usb drive. I currently am dual booting XP and ubuntu, but I need to reinstall windows XP. Is there anyway I can do this from ubuntu?
ubuntu and windows cant see cd drive or just windows?
